channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Jersey sets April 2026 special election as Sherrill resigns House seat ahead of inauguration
item.description: New Jersey Democratic Gov.-elect Mikie Sherrill resigned from her seat in the U.S. House and the current governor on Friday set special election dates...

item.title: After calling Mamdani a ‘100% Communist lunatic,’ Trump now says ‘we’re looking for the same things’
item.description: The Republican president and new Democratic star have indicated an openness to come together for the city they've both called home.

item.title: The Media’s Latest Push To Sink Comey Indictment Was Entirely Based On A Lie
item.description: 'Any assertion that the grand jury 'never voted on the two-count indictment' is contradicted by the official transcript,' a DOJ filing states.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: FBI concludes Trump shooter Thomas Crooks acted alone after unprecedented global investigation

item.title: The Terms of Ukraine’s Defeat, and Ours
item.description: If adopted, the proposed peace plan would yield a victory to Moscow greater than the one it set out to achieve on the battlefield.

item.title: Trump administration sues California over giving in-state tuition to immigrants in U.S. illegally

item.title: ‘We want to trust what we’ve heard’: Farmers remain unsettled on trade, even after China’s biggest U.S. soybean purchase in two years
item.description: China’s U.S. soybean haul has exceeded 1 million metric tons this month. Trump wants China to buy 12 million tons by the end of the year.

item.title: New GOP bill targets funding to states with lenient bail policies

item.title: The Ukrainians Have Room to Maneuver in Peace Deal Proposal
item.description: The plan on offer is better than originally reported. Ukraine should work to make the Russians say no.

item.title: Just 776 FAA employees will get Trump’s $10,000 bonus, but unions say thousands who worked during the shutdown were left out
item.description: The payments will be received no later than Dec. 9, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

item.title: Nuremberg in the Age of Lawfare
item.description: A warped history of justice, Tarantino-style.

item.title: Is President Trump Thinking About Greenland Again?
item.description: Much-touted pharmaceutical deals could end up giving the president new leverage.

item.title: Anti-Natalists At NYT Want You To Think IVF Is The Only Way To Have A Career
item.description: Establishing a norm of egg freezing and IVF will further entrench the view that marriage is a capstone in life, rather than a foundation.

item.title: Going Nuclear
item.description: The Trump administration is right to make nuclear power part of the U.S. energy solution.

item.title: Here’s Why Gavin Newsom’s Race-Based Gerrymandering In CA Will Fail
item.description: 'It’s pretty blatant that they were using race when they drew up new districts to get rid of Republicans,' said Hans von Spakovsky.

item.title: House Republicans demand Trump admin deny Mamdani federal security clearance
item.description: House Republicans urge Trump to deny NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani federal security clearance over alleged radical ties and "anti-American rhetoric."

item.title: Pro-Life Center Takes Its Fight Against Democrat Lawfare To The Supreme Court
item.description: 'It's our hope that our efforts will result in protection for pregnancy centers across the nation,' said First Choice Executive Director Aimee Huber.

item.title: Transportation chief offers advice to increasingly angry Americans: ‘Let’s maybe go back to an era where we didn’t wear our pajamas to the airport’
item.description: "Sometimes you just have to ask people, 'Hey, let's maybe go back to an era where we didn't wear our pajamas to the airport.'"

item.title: The Left Is Nowhere Near Letting Go Of Its Trans Obsession
item.description: The left's approach to defending transgenderism may fluctuate, but its loyalty is unshakeable.
